Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Throggs Neck business improvement district
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of the Throggs Neck BID.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in the Hudson Square business improvement district and an extension of the Hudson Square business improvement district boundaries
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Hudson Square BID and an extension of the Hudson Square BID boundaries.

Items.Title: 451-455 East 116th Street, Block 1710, Lots 22 and 24; Manhattan, Community District No. 11, Council District No. 8.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Throggs Neck business improvement district
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of the Throggs Neck BID.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in the Hudson Square business improvement district and an extension of the Hudson Square business improvement district boundaries
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Hudson Square BID and an extension of the Hudson Square BID boundaries.

Items.Title: 451-455 East 116th Street, Block 1710, Lots 22 and 24; Manhattan, Community District No. 11, Council District No. 8.
Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
